original_text:
The way of the wicked is an abomination to the Lord,
    but he loves him who pursues righteousness.
korean_text: 악인의 길은 여호와께서 미워하셔도 공의를 따라가는 자는 그가 사랑하시느니라

sentences.original_text: The way of the wicked is an abomination to the Lord
but he loves him who pursues righteousness
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 의를 좇는 자를 사랑하신다
